channel.title: Noone can connect
channel.description:
Yes I've made server and noone but me can connect to it it's been up a few days have had around like 30 people on today and all of sudden like noone none of my top players anyone can get on cept for me. I can get on their account seperatly but when they attempt to they can't get on! if anyone has any trouble shooting tips I can follow that'd be really nice so I can get back to working on it and helping people.
Things I've tried
1: dling a whole new source file > failed
2: deleting my client.java file and having my friend give me his (he had the base client.java file for me from his own source unedited)
3: checking all my ports turning em off and on.
4: turning my internet off and then back on then checking my port forwarding everything was in place..
And now I'm out of ideas please need help A.S.A.P TY MUCH LOVE HOMIES

Try utorrent mate.

item.title: Noone can connect
item.dc:creator: @ham_and_must ham and must
item.description:
@ham_and_must wrote:

I don’t have a router but I mean people were on all day today and yesterday I keep my server up most of the day or atleast try to so I mean that’s not the problem just all of a sudden noone can connect I’m confused I’ve tried everything yes I have no-ip duc I even tried making a new ip thing to see if it was the server host and that wasn’t it they couldn’t connect to the new one either so I don’t know what it could be anymore suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Noone can connect
item.dc:creator: @_Jayden1 `Jayden.
item.description:
@_Jayden1 wrote:

Have you downloaded No-ip duc?

Have you port forwarded?

If you have a wireless modem, I suggest downloading utorrent.

Then once you have utorrent do this:

Options > Preferences > Connection

Make sure “Randomize port each connect” is ticked.

Then open your run.bat (Reason you open it now is because If you do below first, When you try to run the server is will say “server already in use.”)

Then on utorrent in the port box, whatever is in there, Change it to 43594, Or whatever your servers Port is 43594 is the most used port…

Then push Okay.

Next,

Options > Speed Guide

Click “Test if port is forwarded properly”

It will redirect you to a page, Which will open your port!

Post if you have any problems.

Read full topic
